title: Alexa, why are you spreading lies about the 2020 election?
description: Alexa says the 2020 race was stolen, even as parent company Amazon promotes the voice assistant as a reliable source of election news.

title: Genetic tester 23andMe’s hacked data on Jewish users offered for sale online
description: A hacker is offering stolen information on millions of 23andMe users, advertising bulk records scraped from inside the company of those identified as Jewish.
